articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: It sure looks like OpenAI trained Sora on game content — and legal experts say that could be a problem - TechCrunch
articles.description: It seems that OpenAI trained its video-generating model, Sora, on copyrighted video game content. And that could be legally problematic.
articles.content: OpenAI has never revealed exactly which data it used to train Sora, its video-generating AI. But from the looks of it, at least some of the data might’ve come from Twitch streams and walkthroughs of … [+8736 chars]
